HP's high capacity cartidges give you up to 800 pages in black and 450 pages in color.

HP offers a choide of 4 or 6-color printing capability.

Media intervention for HP's printer is reduced by 50% with higher media capacity.

HP OfficeJet K7100 printer has multiple paper paths for greater media flexibility where rigid media could be fed straight from the rear.

HP offers wide format duplexing as an option which is not available in any competitors in its class.

For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Consumables/Refills: One Color(CMY) + one Black(K) or Photo (cmK)
